seg.source: 8月11日，武警山东总队烟台支队组织特战狙击手冒着34摄氏度的高温来到昆嵛山开展丛林训练。
seg.translation: On August 11, military police of the Shandong Yantai Detachment organized a special operations sniper who braved high temperatures of 34 degrees at Kunlunshan to initiate jungle training.
August 11, armed police Shandong Corps Yantai Detachment Organization Special Warfare sniper braved 34 degrees Celsius high temperature came to Kunyu to carry out jungle training.
August 11, the Shandong Armed Police Corps Yantai detachment organized special operations snipers braved the high temperature of 34 degrees Celsius to Kunyu Mountain to carry out jungle training.
